name: Asset Class Trend Following Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for 5 asset class ETFs: SPY, EFA, BND, VNQ, GSG
Calculate 10-month SMA (~210 trading days) for each ETF
Hold asset when price > 10-month SMA, otherwise move to cash
Equal weight 20% per asset when held
Rebalance monthly on first trading day

name: Currency Momentum Factor
description:
Load daily bars for 8 major currency pairs vs USD (AUD, EUR, GBP, CAD, JPY, MXN, NZD, CHF)
Calculate 12-month momentum (252-day rate of change) for each pair
Rank currencies cross-sectionally by momentum
Go long top 3 currencies, short bottom 3 currencies
Equal weight within long/short legs, rebalance monthly

name: Dividend Month Anomaly Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for S&P 500 stocks, filter to top 500 by dollar volume with price > $5
Predict which stocks will pay dividends this month using historical pay_date and frequency
Match quarterly (every 3 months), semi-annual (every 6), and annual (same month) patterns
Go long predicted dividend payers, equal weight, rebalance monthly
Dashboard: position count timeseries chart

name: Donchian-Chandelier Breakout Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for GLD, QQQ, and BTCUSD
Calculate 20-day Donchian Channel (highest high / lowest low) and 5-day ATR
Enter long when close breaks above prior bar's Donchian upper band
Exit via trailing chandelier stop (3x ATR from highest high) or Donchian lower band breakdown
Position size using risk_unit: 2% equity risk per trade with stop distance = 3x ATR(5)
Dashboard: event markers for breakout entries and breakdown exits

name: FED Model Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for SPY and SHY, plus 10-Year Treasury yield from FRED
Calculate 3-month change in Treasury yield and 1-year rolling average yield
When rates falling (> 25bps decrease) or yield below average: go long SPY (equities attractive)
When rates rising (> 25bps increase) and yield above average: go long SHY (bonds attractive)
100% allocation to selected asset, rebalance monthly

name: FX Carry Trade Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for 8 G8 currency futures (A6, B6, D6, E6, J6, M6, N6, S6)
Load 3-month OECD interbank rates from FRED for each country
Map interest rates to corresponding currency futures as carry signal
Rank cross-sectionally: long top 3 (highest yield), short bottom 3 (lowest yield)
Equal weight within each leg, monthly rebalance with BackwardPanamaCanal continuation

name: Low Volatility Factor Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for S&P 500 constituents
Calculate 3-year annualized historical volatility (756 trading days) for each stock
Select bottom decile (lowest 10% volatility) cross-sectionally (~50 stocks)
Go long selected low-volatility stocks, equal weight
Rebalance monthly on first trading day

name: Post-Earnings Announcement Drift Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for S&P 500 stocks with price > $1 and earnings announcement data
Calculate EPS surprise percent; track bars since last earnings announcement
Within 60-day holding window: rank eligible stocks by surprise cross-sectionally
Long top decile (most positive surprises), short bottom decile (most negative)
Equal weight 50%/50% long-short, rebalance daily as new earnings arrive

name: Sector Momentum Rotational System
description:
Load daily bars for 10 US sector ETFs (VNQ, XLK, XLE, XLV, XLF, XLI, XLB, XLY, XLP, XLU)
Calculate 12-month momentum (252-day rate of change) for each sector
Select top 3 sectors by momentum cross-sectionally
Go long selected sectors, equal weight (1/3 each)
Rebalance monthly on first trading day

name: Sector Rotation Monetary Policy Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for 8 SPDR sector ETFs and Fed Funds Rate from FRED
Calculate 3-month change in Fed rate to classify regime: easing, tightening, or neutral
Easing (rate drop > 25bps): go long cyclical sectors (XLY, XLI, XLF, XLK, XLB)
Tightening (rate rise > 25bps): go long defensive sectors (XLP, XLV, XLU)
Neutral: equal weight all 8 sectors, rebalance monthly

name: Sector Seasonality Momentum Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for 9 US sector ETFs (XLB, XLI, XLY, XLP, XLV, XLK, XLU, XLE, XLF)
Score each sector 0-12: 12-month momentum tercile (0/2/4) + 1-month momentum tercile (0/2/4) + seasonality (0/2/4)
Seasonality: cyclical sectors favor Nov-Apr, defensive favor May-Oct, neutral score 2 always
Long if score > 9, short if score < 3, exit when score crosses 6
Equal weight within long/short legs, rebalance monthly

name: Short Interest Effect Long-Short Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for NYSE, AMEX, NASDAQ stocks plus short interest and income statement data
Calculate short interest ratio = short interest / shares outstanding
Rank cross-sectionally by short interest ratio
Long bottom decile (lowest 10% short interest), short top decile (highest 10%)
Equal weight across all active positions, rebalance monthly

name: SMA Crossover Strategy Multi-Asset
description:
Load daily bars for 11 assets: futures (ES, NQ, CL, GC, SI, NG), stocks (SPY), crypto (BTC, ETH), FX (EURUSD, GBPUSD)
Build continuation series with BackwardPanamaCanal adjustment and FirstOfMonth rollover
Calculate 50-day and 200-day SMA on adjusted close
Go long when fast SMA > slow SMA, flat otherwise
Equal weight (1/N) across active assets

name: SPY Morning Dip Strategy
description:
Load 5-minute intraday bars for SPY
Capture day's opening price from regular trading hours session
At 9:45 AM ET, if price is below the 9:30 open, enter long (mean reversion)
Exit at 10:30 AM ET (time-based exit), 100% position size
Dashboard: event markers for entry signals (with gap from open) and exit signals

name: Stock Return Reversal Within Sectors Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for S&P 500 stocks with price >= $3
Calculate 1-month return (21 trading days) for each stock
Rank within each GICS industry cross-sectionally
Long bottom 20% performers within each industry (losers, expect reversal up)
Short top 20% performers within each industry (winners, expect reversal down)
50% long + 50% short, equal weight, rebalance monthly

name: Term Structure Effect in Commodities
description:
Load daily bars for 20 commodity futures (energies, metals, grains, softs, meats)
Build continuation series and extract carry signal (front/back contract ratio - 1)
Rank cross-sectionally: long top 4 (highest carry = backwardation), short bottom 4 (lowest carry = contango)
Equal weight 1/N per leg, 100% long + 100% short gross exposure
Rebalance monthly with BackwardPanamaCanal adjustment and FirstOfMonth rollover

name: TradingView-Style Technical Analysis Dashboard
description:
Load daily OHLCV data for analysis (SLV / Silver ETF)
Calculate 9 oscillators: RSI, Stochastic, CCI, ADX, AO, Momentum, MACD, Williams %R, Ultimate Oscillator
Calculate 15 moving averages: SMA/EMA at 10/20/30/50/100/200, Hull MA, VWMA, Ichimoku baseline
Generate buy/sell/neutral signals for each indicator, aggregate into scores
Compute Classic, Fibonacci, Camarilla, and Woodie pivot points
Dashboard: summary gauges, signal count tables, oscillator/MA detail tables, pivot point tables

name: Value Book-to-Market Factor Strategy
description:
Load daily bars for NYSE, AMEX, NASDAQ stocks plus quarterly income statement and balance sheet
Calculate book-to-market ratio = total equity / (close * shares outstanding)
Filter for positive B/M values, forward fill between reporting dates
Long top decile (highest B/M = value stocks), short bottom decile (lowest B/M = growth stocks)
Equal weight across all active positions, rebalance monthly
